topic.title: Use ZeroNet as gateway to connecting to normal websites like youtube
topic.body:
in this talk i wanna gate any idea to use zeronet as a gateway to connecting to anywebsite in internet like google or youtube
if you have any idea or is there anything that you might have in this topic please share
thank you 
this is benb

1628411219_12sCaEUFqE6g3JrDqmEA8pn9yrgxw.body: i did in my youtube channel  - Flowconnect
it's all over the world even the 3th world countries. this banning getting worst in here

1628591661_1NV3qFKgLf7Nnx7L5txkzsg13nuj3.body:
it' more than that 
what if we can have vps running 24/7 and we use zeronet to connect to it and vps can get us to the cleannet
if something can be up and run it can help alot
like those services can create vps for users instantly
in this way users can need to only have store the connection to the vps
it's just and idea so we can overcoming this challenge
